mapper.sql: select comments_id, recommend, review, regdate, member_id, game_id from comments
mapper.select: where game_id=#{game.game_id} order by regdate desc
mapper.insert: insert into comments(comments_id, game_id, member_id, recommend, review) values(seq_comments.nextval, #{game.game_id}, #{member.member_id}, #{recommend}, #{review})
mapper.update: update comments set recommend=#{recommend}, review=#{review} where comments_id=#{comments_id}
